title: Note : Other provisions in the sanctioned DCPR with regards to the applicability of a second lift, second staircase for high-rise / Special buildings shall not be applicable after provision of a Fire Tower as given above
clause_text: Note : Other provisions in the sanctioned DCPR with regards to the applicability of a second lift, second staircase for high-rise / Special buildings shall not be applicable after provision of a Fire Tower as given above.
